title: [Curlew Brook, Waterfall View]
description: A path, its gravel neatly raked in narrow furrows, comes to an end here along a bluff overlooking the Mistydeep River.  This vantage point provides a perfect view of the falls, where the entire breadth of the river cascades over a wide, stone escarpment, frothing the blue-green waters below.

A path, its gravel neatly raked in narrow furrows, comes to an end here along a bluff overlooking the Mistydeep River.  This vantage point provides a perfect view of the falls, where the entire breadth of the river cascades over a wide, stone escarpment, frothing the starlit waters below.
